Moving Hâ€“2A to United States Department of Agriculture Act of 2023
To transfer the administration of the H-2A program from the Secretary of Labor to the Secretary of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Moving H-2A to United States Department of Agriculture Act of 2023
This bill moves administration of the H-2A (temporary agricultural workers) program from the Department of Labor to the Department of Agriculture.
